H2.text: who used morse code in world war 2. Submarines

A4.text: civilian and military pilots were required to be able to use Morse code

A5.text: Radiotelegraphy using Morse code was vital during World War II, especially in carrying messages between the warships and the naval bases of the belligerents.

A6.text: Morse code radio operator training. U.S. Navy.

A7.text: 200 hours of at increasing speeds plus an ASCII-to-CW file generator program.
